children.value: Setting up and making a query

setAttribute(PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE, PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION); $sql = "SELECT * FROM user"; // use exec() because no results are returned foreach($conn->query($sql) as $row){ echo $row['name'] . "\t"; echo $row['email'] . "\t"; echo $row['password'] . "\n"; } } catch(PDOException $e) { echo $sql . "
" . $e->getMessage(); } $conn = null; ?>

<?php
include "helper.php";

/*
 * helper.php contains
 * $results->query("SELECT member_id, email, fullname, level FROM members");
 */
$user = $results->fetchAll(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC);
foreach ($user as $key)
{
  send_offer(
    $key['member_id'],
    $key['email'],
    $key['fullname'],
    $key['level']);
}
?>
